description: You are an expert in creative writing, social media engagement, and character voice development. Your task is to generate {{ number_of_posts }} short 'updates' (tweets/posts) for the agent {{ agent_name }} in the style of Twitter posts. These posts are for season {{ season_number }}, episode {{ episode_number }}.

context.agent_yaml: {{ agent_json }} (This provides the agent's personality, backstory, etc.)
context.season_yaml: {{ season_json }} (This provides the season details, including description and highlights for the season)
context.episode_yaml: {{ episode_json }} (This provides the episode details, including description and highlights for the episode)
context.previous_episode: {{ previous_episode }} (This provides the previous episode details, including description and highlights for the episode. Ignore if none is provided as this means we are creating episode 1, so there is no previous episode)

post_requirements: Reflect Agent's Personality: Be consistent with {{ agent_name }}'s personality, tone, and communication style as defined in the agent JSON.
Relate to Setting/Technology:  Reference elements of the setting, technology, or other relevant details from the agent's universe as defined in the agent JSON.
Incorporate Episode Context: Align with the season overview and specific episode overview provided in the season JSON.
Highlight Observations: Center around misunderstandings, comedic observations, or serious reflections relevant to the episode's theme.
Consider Emojis: Optionally use emojis from this set: {{ agent_json }} or use any emojis that are relevant to the episode's theme.
Consider Hashtags: Optionally use hashtags from this set: {{ agent_json }} or use any hashtags that are relevant to the episode's theme.
Length Constraint: Each post must be under {{ post_length }} characters.
Sign-Off: End each post with the sign-off: '#{{ agent_name }}'

output_format.structure: Output a valid JSON object containing a list of posts under the `posts` key. Each post should be a separate object in the list and include the following:

fields.name: post_id
fields.description: A unique identifier for the post (e.g., s1_e1_post1, s1_e1_post2).

fields.name: post_number
fields.description: The ordinal number of the post within the episode (e.g., 1, 2, 3).

fields.name: post_content
fields.description: The actual text of the post.

fields.name: post_highlights
fields.description: A brief, one-sentence description of the key takeaway or event in the post.

output_requirements.format: Only output valid JSON. Do not include any text outside of the JSON structure.
